intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you do when you are bored?
What is your favorite way to spend time with family?

respond_situations.starter_line: Hello! What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You want to order a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Can I help you find something?
respond_situations.description: You are in a shop. You are looking for a toy.

ask_situations.instruction: You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to borrow a game from your friend. ..

listening_script.text: I watch cartoons in the morning. My favorite cartoon is fun. I like the characters and stories. My friend likes cartoons too. We watch together sometimes.

monologue.topic: Talk about a typical day at school

follow_up_questions.question: What do you do in the morning?
When do you have lunch at school?
Who do you sit with in class?
